evs.metric.metrics
Interface SingleValuedMetric

All Known Implementing Classes:
Correlation, MeanAbsoluteError, MeanCaptureRateDiagram, MeanError, MeanErrorOfProbabilityDiagram, RelativeMeanError, RelativeOperatingCharacteristic, ROCScore, RootMeanSquareError, SampleSize, SingleValuedQQPlot, ThresholdMetricStore
public interface SingleValuedMetric

An interface identifying a single-valued forecast verification metric.

Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com

Method Detail

getForecastStatistic

VectorFunction getForecastStatistic()
Returns the forecast statistic to be applied to the vector of ensemble members (or a single member in the case of a single-valued forecast).

Returns:
the forecast statistic

setForecastStatistic

void setForecastStatistic(VectorFunction forecastStat)
Sets the forecast statistic to be applied to paired input that comprise multiple forecasts at a single time (e.g. ensemble forecast input).

Parameters:
forecastStat - the forecast statistic
